ItemTooltips.blink: The mother of all ganking items.
ItemTooltips.branches: For the extra stats, beneficial in early game. Will be upgraded into wand.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Greatly helps in this Sand Storm build for those annoying spammers.
ItemTooltips.clarity: Use this after getting lvl 2 stun.
ItemTooltips.bottle: This one is for those sk's that want to roam.
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: For ganking, anti-gank and rune control.
ItemTooltips.ward_sentry: Dewarding and for those stupid invisible Heroes.
ItemTooltips.tpscroll: This can make a difference, I promise.
ItemTooltips.bracer: Extra stats and survivability. You can skip this if everything is going well.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Take this if the team needs one badly.
ItemTooltips.pipe: Great for those bigtime clashes and when it's time to push.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: Mana regen, strength stats and burst HP regen for you and your teammate.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Movement Speed and Mana Regen.. plus the benefits of flying.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: For that long-ass stun: blink-forcestaff-stun or v/v.
ItemTooltips.necronomicon:
Push strat. check.
True sight. check.
DPS. check.
Be sure to upgrade it to level 3.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Extra pulse, extra damage. Low cooldown on Epicenter, plus the benefits of all attributes.
ItemTooltips.radiance: Troll build FTW. You gotta troll sometimes. ^_^
ItemTooltips.soul_ring: Health and Mana Burst for spamming purposes to annoy the hell out of your enemy.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Combo Blink+Epicenter+Burrowstrike+Sand Storm. You got to have this.
ItemTooltips.veil_of_discord: You want more damage of course.

AbilityTooltips.sandking_burrowstrike: Bread. Stun atleast 2-3 or better yet, get 5 of them especially after epicenter and for that epic juke together with your Butter and Blink Dagger. Money-maker 1.
AbilityTooltips.sandking_sand_storm: Butter. For harassment/lane control, dps and that epic juke together with your Bread and Blink Dagger. Money-maker 2.
AbilityTooltips.sandking_caustic_finale: Juice. That bomb surely hurts of course, helps with harassment/lane control. Money-maker 3.
AbilityTooltips.sandking_epicenter: Bacon. That ultimate teamfight will always be epic with this, thus, it's called EPICENTER. Money-maker 4.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: Steak. It'll make you beefy in all aspects.
